issue.title: [C++] Consolidate file and shared memory IO interfaces
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-280](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-280). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's some overlap between arrow/ipc/memory.h and arrow/io/interfaces.h that will make it more difficult to use the record batch serialization code for both IPC and file-like / RPC messaging.
